IBM developerWork article about administration and naming: "Implementing vendor-independent JMS solutions"

s1.subtitle: J2ME related site
ScalAgent Distributed Technologies
s1.p: ScalAgent is the provider of the open-source platform on top of which JORAM's MOM is built.

s1.name: Softwares
s1.p: The following software components are involved in the JORAM platform:

ul.li: JavaCup is a Java parser generator used in the message selection feature.
kXML is Enhydra's XML parser for J2ME used by kJORAM for communicating with the JORAM platform.
Regexp is Apache's regular expression parser used in JORAM message selection feature.
SOAP is Apache's implementation of the SOAP protocol used by JORAM SOAP proxy.
Xerces is Apache's XML parser used for JORAM platform configuration.
